00023 #ifndef __NITF_FIELD_WARNING_H__
00024 #define __NITF_FIELD_WARNING_H__
00025 
00026 #include "nitf/System.h"
00027 #include "nitf/Field.h"
00028 
00029 NITF_CXX_GUARD
00030 
00031 
00039 typedef struct _nitf_FieldWarning
00040 {
00041     /* Offset in bytes to the field in the NITF file */
00042     nitf_Off fileOffset;
00043 
00044     /* Name of the offending field in the following format
00045        hdr.section(i).  ...  .fieldName
00046        section  - Any of the following section abbreviations.
00047        If a section can occur more than once (i)
00048        will appear where "i" is the occurance number
00049        in the order they appear in the file
00050        hdr     - Main file header (Identification & Organization Segment)
00051        ish(i)  - ith image sub-header
00052        imd(i)  - ith image data section
00053        gsh(i)  - ith graphics sub-header
00054        grd(i)  - ith graphics data section
00055        tsh(i)  - ith text sub-header
00056        ted(i)  - ith text data section
00057        esh(i)  - ith extended data sub-header
00058        edd(i)  - ith extended data section
00059        
00060        <TRE>(i)- ith occurance of a particular TRE in a particular
00061        section (i.e. hdr.ish(2).ACFTB(1).SCNUM 
00062     */
00063     
00064     char *fieldName;
00065 
00066     /* Original field found in the file */
00067     nitf_Field *field;
00068 
00069     /* Description of what was expected */
00070     char *expectation;
00071 
00072 }
00073 nitf_FieldWarning;
00074 
00075

00088                             const char *fieldName,
00089                             nitf_Field *field,
00090                             const char
00091                             *expectation,
00092                             nitf_Error *
00093                             error);

00112                                                      nitf_Error * error);
